title: 12 Annoyng questions to ask your teacher
text:
1. Can I go to the tinkle Dinkle ha ha room?
2. How do we know the sky isn't really green and we're just collor blind?
3. Why do dogs sniff our buts?
4. How's the diet going
5. Haven't personal calculators redered long division irrelevant?
6. did you get up on the wrong side of the bed this morning?
7. Is this information pertinent to real life?
8. why did they name uranus uranus?
9. If you stick yourself with a pencil, will you get lead poisoning?
10. Do amboas feel love?
11. Could you repeat the question i wasn't listening?
12. Why do all the people in the world have different skin colours

replies.text:
Ah sugar (da da da da da da) ah honey honey (dú dú dú dú dú dú) You are my candy girl and you've got me wanting you.
(Þetta átti að vera grein en var ekki samþykt. Eftir að hafa lesið þessa grein get ég ekki skilið afhverju!)

HA HA HA, sniðugt. I'm as you can call “I good student” so I won't use that… maybe nr. 11. That's not really off the line ;þ
Everybody clap your hands and touch your head at the same time!

ætli það sé ekki nóg að segja í miðjum tíma: “megum við fara” eða í upphafi tímans “kennari,við ætlum að gefa þér frí í þessum tíma”
svo þegar kennarinn les upp “bhss” þá attu að segja “mættur”
